sentences.sentence: In one of those summers I worked for J. Koch clothier at the haberdashery counter.
sentences.translation: 有一年夏天，我在男服装商j·科赫的男士服装店工作。

sentences.sentence: Uniqlo, a clothier, plans to reduce its proportion of Chinese-made garments from 90% to 65% in the next three to five years.
sentences.translation: 服装制造商优衣库计划在未来三至五年将在华制造的服装比重由90%减少到65%。

sentences.sentence: Others, like edgy, punk/rock music clothier Hot Topic ( HOTT - news - people ), give out monthly bonuses, cash and prize incentives.
sentences.translation: 其他一些雇主，比如前卫的朋克/摇滚音乐及服饰零售商Hot Topic，每月发放奖金、现金和奖品奖励。
